overview: The 21st installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series. Every time, I carefully selected and recorded it in this work from among the many posted videos, but I further delved into the background of the video, such as "Scary", "Danger", "Super Abnormal Phenomenon", etc., and strengthened my research. It is said that the photographer visited the fireworks display with his friends. I've been photographing fireworks for about 30 minutes in time, but in the image that is supposed to be shooting fireworks, the face of the person who was copied like a curse is reflected.
tagline: A signal from a different world that is entering into a small gap in daily life, anniversaries and memories.
title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 21
